question:
You have seen an advertisement from a couple, who live in Austalia, for someone to teach their two children your language for a year.
Write a letter to the couple. In your letter
* explain why think you would be suitable for the job
* say what else you could do for the family
* give your reasons for wanting the job
text: I hope this letter finds you well and I am writing this letter to express my interest in an advertisement for a new language for your children. I am sure that I would give the best training as I am holding a master's degree in teaching methods and techniques. The  strong 10 years of professional experience that I am having is an extra qualification which will be an extra benefit to your kids to teach my local accent.

Basically, I am from a village cultural background and I learnt extra cultural skills during my graduation  I can also teach these skills to your kids if they want to learn. In addition, I know how to speak and write other terminology as well  and I can also send details of that language if you guys are really interested in that. Last but not the least, I will take care of them during weekends and work as a babysitter if required.
Due to ongoing Covid19, I lost my current job and I do not have any employment at this time.

It has been 10 months and until now I did not find any of the best and the job is much needed for me to look after my family expenses. Hence, I look forward to hearing an update to this letter and feel  blessed to teach your children.
